sentences.cn: 一架衔接的班机取消了.

sentences.en: A piston links to a drive shaft by means of a connecting rod.
sentences.cn: 活塞通过连杆与驱动轴相连.

sentences.en: An experiment into connecting the Web with language.
sentences.cn: 一个使用自然语言连接网络的试验.

sentences.en: Delayed flights have a ripple effect. Just one late flight could be carrying passengers for a dozen connecting services.
sentences.cn: 航班晚点会引发连锁反应。仅仅一趟晚点的航班就可能运载着许多需要转机的乘客。

sentences.en: Double rhythms, resounding through the lyric depiction and connecting with each other , indicate the thespian place of mankind and the cognition of the writer to this thespian place.
sentences.cn: 这双重旋律互为表里, 表明了人类的某种悲剧性处境以及作家对这种悲剧性处境的感受和认识.

sentences.en: I connected the wires for the transformer.
sentences.cn: 我给变压器接上了电线。

sentences.en: My connecting plane didn't depart for another six hours.
sentences.cn: 我搭乘的联运航班又过了6个小时才起飞。

sentences.en: On the other hand, the service might have problems connecting to the queue manager or accessing its initiation queue.
sentences.cn: 另一方面，此服务可能拥有连接到队列管理器或访问其发起队列的相关问题。

sentences.en: Some adhering junctions are present as narrow bands connecting two cells.
sentences.cn: 有些粘附连接以一窄带的形式连接两个细胞.

sentences.en: The bar fell into the machinery and sheared a connecting - rod.
sentences.cn: 那根棒掉进机器里把连给打弯了.

sentences.en: The chart can then display the links connecting these groups.
sentences.cn: 这张图就会显示出这些群体之间的关联。

sentences.en: The connecting rod is attached to the piston by the piston pin.
sentences.cn: 连杆与活塞的连接是采用活塞销.

sentences.en: The connecting rod may drive a valve stem directly.
sentences.cn: 连杆可以直接带动阀门的把柄.

sentences.en: The end of the connecting tube is sealed with a flame.
sentences.cn: 连接管的末端用火焰密封.

sentences.en: The only real connecting link was the monarch himself.
sentences.cn: 唯一的实际联系是君主本人.

sentences.en: The rod - bearing cap attaches the connecting rod to the crankpin.
sentences.cn: 连杆轴瓦盖将连杆安装到曲轴销上.

sentences.en: The two rooms have connecting doors.
This phrase serves as a connecting link between the preceding and the following.
sentences.cn: 这个短语起到了承上启下的作用.

sentences.en: You can connect the speakers to your CD player.
sentences.cn: 你可以将这些扬声器与你的激光唱机连接起来。

phrases.tran_cn: 连接棒；连接杆；连接杠杆
连接杆；可拆链环；连接环节；联接链节；连接片
连接终端，接头子；连接触点；夹具

trans.tran_cn: 连接( connect的现在分词 )，把…看作有关联，由…联想到，给…接通电话
trans.tran_en: If something or someone connects one thing to another, or if one thing connects to another, or if two things connect, the two things are joined together
